name: Hexabilis
description:
Hexabilis is a score based puzzle game with stability as a main feature.

You must drop colored pieces and make them explode without tilting the board too much. Each piece of the same color you connect make a Color Chain. Some pieces are Bombs that explode when you place them, with all the matching color chain connected to them. Explosions give you points and increase a points multiplier. Make great combos without losing stability!

Left clic : Place the piece

Right clic : Hold the piece in reserve, or swap with the piece currently in reserve

Mouse wheel : Rotate the piece

Hugo Sinet : game designer and lead game artist

Alexandre Montel : programmer

Jonathan Desjardins : programmer

Christophe Tran : UI/UX designer

Sound design by Norma Fall and Zapsplat

Music by Eric Matyas

Special thanks to e-artsup Paris

You can post your highscores in comment !

Have fun and make the highest score you can!
